function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 transmission in confined and crowded indoor spaces","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission and outbreak of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation control measures and enhancing HVAC systems","Technologies":"Ventilation control measures, HVAC system modifications","People":"Employees, visitors, and occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building managers, employers, and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in workplaces","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of infectious diseases including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation efficiency and increasing air exchanges","Technologies":"HVAC system modifications, ventilation control measures","People":"Employees, visitors, and occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building managers, employers, and stakeholders"}]}
